note: I am Sandip Sankar Ghosh from Kolkata. I grew up in a protective Indian family in Kolkata. After passing a bachelor in physiotherapy (BPT), I worked for some organization and besides this, I have my own practice. Despite having a busy schedule I use to feel something missing in life. Then I did my first trek in Sikkim, the Barsey Rhododendron trek with a group of backpackers friend and fell in love with the mountain.
